author: roberto.bayardo
content: right, there are a couple other spec updates around updating signing and tx id hashes for the blob tx, and then the open issue of how to handle resubmitting blob txs due to reorgs which we'll probably want to test in a devnet before goerli.

author: techbro_ccoli
content:
We have released our initial 4844 fixtures here: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/v0.2.5 under the name `fixtures-cancun.tar.gz`. 

More information on these tests: https://execution-spec-tests.readthedocs.io/en/latest/test_case_descriptions/eip4844/
